author: Salman Akhtar
title: La Crosse's Trials: Community Resilience Amid Fire, Crime, and a Call for Justice
text:
In the heart of La Crosse, a series of events unfolded that captures the essence of a community navigating through challenges, change, and the quest for justice. From a garage inferno that threatened the peace of a neighborhood to the establishment of a civilian review board poised to oversee law enforcement activities, these stories weave a complex tapestry of life in La Crosse.
Blaze on Market Street: A Community's Ordeal
The tranquility of an ordinary day was shattered when a fire erupted in a detached garage on Market Street, causing not only extensive damage to the structure itself but also impacting surrounding homes with heat damage. The La Crosse Fire Department swiftly responded to the emergency, battling the flames and preventing a larger catastrophe. As fire investigators delve into the cause of the blaze, the incident serves as a stark reminder of the vulnerabilities embedded within our daily lives and the relentless spirit of first responders who stand on the frontline.
Law and Disorder: From Erratic Driving to Drug Charges
Amidst the tranquility of French Island, an erratic driver caught the attention of local law enforcement, spiraling into a revelation of underlying criminal activity. Geraldine Murphy, a 72-year-old resident of La Crosse, found herself ensnared in the jaws of the law when methamphetamine was discovered in her possession. Facing charges that could lead to three-and-a-half years in prison, Murphy's predicament underscores a broader narrative of substance abuse that quietly pervades even the most serene communities. Similarly, a 55-year-old man's loitering inside a La Crosse apartment complex led to his arrest on multiple drug charges, further illuminating the shadowy corners of drug misuse and its grip on individuals.
Voices for Change: The Civilian Review Board Initiative
In a bold move towards transparency and accountability, La Crosse County has green-lit the formation of a civilian review board tasked with monitoring law enforcement activity within the county. This decision, emerging from two years of contemplation and discussion by a special county committee, marks a significant pivot towards community-centric governance. Despite facing opposition from approximately 70 percent of participants in a local opinion poll, the board's establishment signals a hopeful stride towards ensuring law enforcement practices reflect the values and concerns of the citizens they serve. This two-year trial period will be a critical phase for both the board and the community, as it seeks to foster a deeper understanding and trust between civilians and law enforcement.
The fabric of La Crosse is interwoven with stories of adversity, accountability, and the unyielding pursuit of a safer, more just community. From the devastating garage fire on Market Street to the establishment of a civilian review board and the relentless battle against drug-related crimes, these events mirror the complex challenges and resilience found within this vibrant community. As La Crosse navigates through these trials, the collective spirit and resolve of its residents shine as a beacon of hope and transformation, promising a future where safety, justice, and community solidarity stand paramount.

author: lavozdegalicia
title: Oleiros organiza 82 excursiones para los escolares del municipio
text:
Oleiros organiza 82 excursiones para los escolares del municipio
OLEIROS
El Concello prepara jornadas por el entorno local y de varios d√≠as por otros puntos de Galicia23 ene 2025 . Actualizado a las 19:59 h.
El Concello de
Oleiros ha programado 82 excursiones para los pr√≥ximos meses, jornadas para estudiantes de ense√±anza p√∫blicas. Los desplazamientos ser√°n cerca de los centros escolares ¬´para que co√±ezan a riqueza medioambiental que te√±en na s√∫a localidade¬ª, indican fuentes municipales. Las salidas ser√°n a la laguna de Mera, la Finca da Carballeira, el Bosque dos Veci√±os, Bastiagueiro y el r√≠o Xenti√±a, la isla del Castillo de Santa Cruz y el Souto de Vista Alegre.
El Ayuntamiento tambi√©n organizar√°, y sufragar√°, excursiones de un d√≠a por Galicia, a lugares como Lugo, Santiago, A Terra Ch√°, Pontedeume, Pontevedra o Ferrol, lugares de gran historia que compartir√°n con los participantes.
Tambi√©n se han previsto excursiones de varios d√≠as, pensadas para fomentar la convivencia y el afecto e investigar algunos de los bosques m√°s espectaculares ¬´e paisaxes m√°is emocionantes de Galicia¬ª. Casi todos los colegios e institutos se animaron a participar y conocer√°n lugares como la Serra do Courel,
Sobrado dos Monxes, tras la huella de Pepa a Loba, o las Fragas do Eume.

author: Rujuta Thete
title: Clip of Priest Performing Orthodox Christian Ritual Falsely Linked to Kumbh Mela
text:
A video of a priest taking a dip in a lake is going viral to claim that Christians have been influenced by Maha Kumbh Mela and have decided to "adopt" the ritual.
REMOVE AD
How did we find out the truth?: We noticed '@danilescuandrei' username on the viral video which led us to a TikTok video (accessed via VPN) shared by the user.
The caption of this video specified that it is from Slobozia, a city in Romania.
It further stated that it shows a priest performing a ritual as a part of 'celebration of the Epiphany' which is an Orthodox Christian tradition to commemorate the baptism of Jesus Christ.
It is practiced by many Orthodox Christians by submerging themselves in icy water to symbolize the cleansing of their souls.
We also found
reportsabout this tradition.We also contacted a Catholic priest residing in Navi Mumbai who confirmed to us that the ritual seen in the video signifies a tradition of Orthodox Christians and marks the occasion of the baptism of Jesus Christ.
This ritual is also called the day of the Epiphany.
Conclusion: A video showing a priest performing an Orthodox Christian Epiphany ritual is being falsely linked to Kumbh Mela.
(Not convinced of a post or information you came across online and want it verified? Send us the details on WhatsApp at 9540511818 , or e-mail it to us at webqoof@thequint.com and we'll fact-check it for you. You can also read all our fact-checked stories here.)
(At The Quint, we question everything. Play an active role in shaping our journalism by becoming a member today.)

author: Jim Thomas
title: Ahmed Abou Hashima Unveils $300M Agri-Food Complex | Newsmax.com
text: By Jim Thomas | Thursday, 28 December 2023 07:31 PM EST Ahmed Abou Hashima, founder and chair of MAFI Company for Agricultural Produce Industries, has disclosed plans for an agri-food industrial complex, poised to be the Middle East's largest. Valued at $300 million, the project is a collaborative effort with foreign investment. The signing ceremony was attended by dignitaries including Egypt's Prime Minister Dr. Mostafa Madbouly, Industry Minister Ahmed Samir Saleh, and Hossam Hibah, CEO of the General Authority for Investment and Free Zones. The event was attended by global agri-food technology leaders. Situated in Sadat City Industrial Zone across 154,000 square meters (1,657,642 square feet) MAFI's complex comprises five cutting-edge plants. It includes Egypt's most extensive orange and tomato concentrate facilities, a pioneering cloudy product plant, and one of the world's largest freeze-drying facilities for fruits and vegetables. With an annual production capacity exceeding 100,000 tons in Phase I, the complex targets a turnover of $200 million. Phase II aims for a production capacity of 200,000 tons, translating to a $400 million turnover. Partners include JBT and Cabin Plant from the United States and GEA from Germany. Beltone Holding Co. conducted studies to ascertain financial viability, while BCG Co. analyzed market dynamics and trends. Hashima emphasized the complex's potential to generate over 7,000 direct and indirect jobs, contributing to Egypt's economic growth. The project's vision includes exporting over 80% of its production, enhancing global market reach, and attracting foreign direct investment. Jim Thomas is a writer based in Indiana. He holds a bachelor's degree in Political Science, a law degree from U.I.C. Law School, and has practiced law for more than 20 years. ¬© 2023 Newsmax. All rights reserved. Receive breaking news and original analysis - sent right to your inbox. Interest-Based Advertising | Do not sell or share my personal information Newsmax, Moneynews, Newsmax Health, and Independent. author: @rcnradio
title: Pensiones en Colombia: ¬øQui√©nes perder√≠an la herencia con la reforma? | RCN Radio
text: Pensiones en Colombia: ¬øQui√©nes perder√≠an la herencia con la reforma de Petro? Se sigue discutiendo en el Congreso la reforma pensional propuesta por el Gobierno Petro. As√≠ va el debate. En la Comisi√≥n S√©ptima de la C√°mara de Representantes se lleva a cabo el tercer debate de la reforma pensional, en medio de controversias y acusaciones. La Mesa Directiva de la C√°mara hab√≠a programado una audiencia p√∫blica para escuchar a los sectores interesados en la reforma, pero ni los congresistas ni los invitados asistieron. Entre los cambios en torno a las pensiones en Colombia que se siguen debatiendo es la posibilidad de heredarlas, de acuerdo con el proyecto de ley, este tendr√° un cambio considerable para quienes est√©n esperando recibir la mesada de un fallecido. Lea adem√°s: [Prima de mitad de a√±o: ¬øQu√© pensionados NO la recibir√°n?](https://www.rcnradio.com/colombia/prima-de-mitad-de-ano-que-pensionados-no-la-recibiran) ¬øQui√©nes S√ç y qui√©nes NO heredar√≠an las pensiones con reforma de Petro? De acuerdo con la reforma propuesta por el Gobierno Petro, las reglas sobre la herencia de las pensiones podr√≠an cambiar en el pa√≠s, as√≠ lo advirtieron algunos especialistas. As√≠ las cosas, se espera que los recursos lleguen a nutrir el sistema que se encarga de las mesadas de los afiliados, esto sobre todo u se hace el fortalecimiento a Colpensiones. La propuesta implica que solo los hijos menores de edad o con discapacidad podr√≠an heredar la pensi√≥n. Por lo que los c√≥nyuges o compa√±eros permanentes no tendr√≠an derecho a heredar la pensi√≥n, a menos que est√©n discapacitados o tengan hijos menores a cargo. La propuesta ha generado controversia y debate entre pol√≠ticos y ciudadanos colombianos, pues algunos argumentan que esta medida afectar√≠a negativamente a los adultos mayores y a las familias que dependen de las pensiones. Mientras que otros sostienen que la reforma es necesaria para garantizar la sostenibilidad del sistema de pensiones en el pa√≠s. La decisi√≥n final sobre la reforma a√∫n no se ha tomado y est√° sujeta a debate en el Congreso colombiano. De inter√©s: [Cuenta de ahorros pensional: BBVA anuncia cinco beneficios](https://www.rcnradio.com/economia/cuenta-de-ahorros-pensional-bbva-anuncia-cinco-beneficios) Cabe destacar que el representante del Partido Conservador, Luis Miguel L√≥pez, se√±al√≥ que la actual situaci√≥n evidencia un intento de "pupitrear" la reforma pensional sin garant√≠as para la ciudadan√≠a y los congresistas. Por otro lado, la representante Martha Alfonso, coordinadora de ponentes, sostuvo que los citantes deb√≠an acoger la fecha establecida por la Mesa Directiva y organizar la log√≠stica para el evento. En medio de la pol√©mica, el presidente de la C√°mara convoc√≥ a los congresistas para iniciar la discusi√≥n y votaci√≥n del proyecto el pr√≥ximo lunes festivo, 10 de junio. La situaci√≥n sigue generando debate sobre la transparencia y el manejo de la reforma pensional en el Congreso. Sistema Integrado Digital

author: Sharai Bohannon
title: You Can Now Stream This ‚ÄúMesmerizing‚Äù and ‚ÄúVisually stunning‚Äù Masterpiece for Free
text:
You Can Now Stream This ‚ÄúMesmerizing‚Äù and ‚ÄúVisually stunning‚Äù Masterpiece for Free
The wait is finally over for Adams Family Films fans. Their elusive 2023 nightmare fuel, Where the Devil Roams, is now free to watch on Tubi. This is a momentous occasion for those who missed this creepy gem in its festival run last year. If you somehow missed 2021‚Äôs Hellbender and are unfamiliar with the Adams Family values, then allow me to explain why this title has horror nerds changing their weekend plans.
In the film,
‚ÄúIn the dregs of Depression Era America, a family of performers travels a cold, dying carnival circuit. Seven likes books; Maggie‚Äôs fond of hammers; daughter Eve‚Äôs obsessed with scissors. On a ratty stage, quiet Eve sings for their supper, but off-stage their bloody side act is booming. When the family‚Äôs bond is severed by a violent comeuppance, Eve is there to pick up the pieces. After stealing magic from a sinister Devil-dealing carny, the family‚Äôs gruesome act begins to shine. But Eve must continue to cut and sew, as the Devil guides them from below.‚Äù
Also Read:
This Tubi Documentary Exposes Catholicism‚Äôs Most Sickening Secrets
Where the Devil Roams was written and directed by Toby Poser, Zelda Adams, and John Adams. The movie stars Zelda Adams, Toby Poser, John Adams, Lulu Adams, and Sam Rodd.
Many fans have already injected this disturbing film into their eyeballs and are obsessed with the aesthetic, soundtrack, and imagery. Other Adams stans are just excited to see it land on Tubi so they can finally see it.
See what Twitter is saying
Also Read:
The Legitmately Chilling Tubi Original You Haven‚Äôt Seen Yet: ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt see that ending coming even a little bit‚Äù
I was one of many people who never got a chance to see the movie last year. I took that personally and am happy I get to rectify that this weekend. Find me at
@misssharai if you are also about to find Where the Devil Roams, which seems to be Tubi this month.

title: Le Valais va interdire le smartphone dans toutes ses √©coles, une premi√®re en Suisse romande
text:
Valais

Le Valais va interdire le smartphone dans toutes ses √©coles, une premi√®re en Suisse romande
Le Valais va interdire les t√©l√©phones portables dans toutes les √©coles du canton, a annonc√© jeudi le ministre de l'Education Christophe Darbellay dans la presse. La mesure s'appliquera aussi pendant les pauses. C'est le premier canton romand √† prendre cette d√©cision.
Le Valais va devenir le troisi√®me canton suisse √† interdire les t√©l√©phones portables dans les √©coles, apr√®s Nidwald et Argovie.
"De plus en plus d'enfants pr√©sentent des difficult√©s d'apprentissage et de lecture. Leur capacit√© √† se concentrer diminue", explique le conseiller d'Etat valaisan en charge de l'Economie et de la Formation dans les journaux al√©maniques du groupe Tamedia.
"Pression de groupe"
L'interdiction des t√©l√©phones portables s'appliquera pendant tout le temps pass√© dans l'enceinte de l'√©cole, y compris les pauses et le temps de midi, pr√©cise-t-il.
Le ministre centriste estime que des r√®gles uniformes dans tout le canton soulagent les enseignants et les parents, car "la pression du groupe est √©lev√©e chez les enfants et les adolescents".

Amedisys (AMED) Q2 Revenue Tops 5%
Amedisys(NASDAQ:AMED), a leading provider of home health, hospice, and high acuity post-acute care services, reported quarterly earnings for the period ending June 30, 2025, on July 29, 2025. The most significant news is that the company outperformed market expectations on both revenue and adjusted profitability, even as merger-related costs weighed on GAAP results. GAAP revenue reached $621.9 million, ahead of the $611.99 million GAAP consensus, and Non-GAAP EPS was $1.54, well over the $1.36 analyst forecast (non-GAAP). While core operations showed strength, reported GAAP net income dropped to $28.1 million from $32.3 million a year ago, with the decrease driven by $26.3 million in expenses linked to the pending UnitedHealth Group merger. Overall, the quarter demonstrated continued momentum in Amedisys‚Äôs operational performance, but this was tempered by non-operational items and transition uncertainty. Source: Analyst estimates for the quarter provided by FactSet. Amedisys operates a national network of 519 care centers, serving nearly half a million patients each year across 38 states and Washington, D.C. Its primary business lines include home health services, which provide skilled nursing and therapy in patients' homes; hospice care for end-of-life support; and high acuity care, which delivers hospital-level treatment at home through partnerships.Continue reading

author: Meganoticias
title: Daniela Ar√°nguiz cuestion√≥ a Catalina Palacios por postular al Miss Chile a los 45 a√±os: "No es para mujeres que ya somos mam√°s" - Meganoticias
text:
Daniela Ar√°nguiz cuestion√≥ a Catalina Palacios por postular al Miss Chile a los 45 a√±os: "No es para mujeres que ya somos mam√°s"
La cantante Catalina Palacios sorprendi√≥ al anunciar su candidatura al Miss Universo Chile. A sus 45 a√±os, postul√≥ al casting y logr√≥ convencer a los jueces de ser elegida para ingresar directamente a la competencia por la corona.
En el concurso nacional, Catalina representa a Maitencillo, comuna en la que reside desde hace varios a√±os. Ahora deber√° competir con otras destacadas participantes, como Antonia Casanova, ganadora del Miss Universe Santiago, e Inna Moll, candidata de Vitacura.
Ir a la siguiente nota
Sin embargo, su participaci√≥n gener√≥ reacciones dividas. Por un lado, hubo usuarios que manifestaron su apoyo a la recordada chica "Mekano", la cuestionaron por ingresar al certamen a su edad, argumentando que la sucesora de Emilia Dides deber√≠a ser una mujer m√°s joven.
Daniela Ar√°nguiz cuestion√≥ a Catalina Palacios por postular al Miss Chile a los 45 a√±os
En este contexto, Daniela Ar√°nguiz se sum√≥ a las cr√≠ticas, dando su sincera opini√≥n en el programa "S√≠gueme". Todo esto luego de que Julia Vial afirm√≥ que Catalina "est√° en su mejor momento. Encuentro que est√° guap√≠sima, no representa 45 a√±os, se ve mucho m√°s joven".
LO √öLTIMO
Acto seguido, Daniela la interrumpi√≥, ya que no estuvo de acuerdo con sus dichos: "Ya, Julia, por favor, hablemos en serio. ¬øHasta cu√°ndo? Mira, Catalina Palacios es una mujer hermosa, siempre lo ha sido. Es estupenda, hermosa, preciosa, qu√© mujer m√°s linda".
Luego, a√±adi√≥ que, a su parecer, "este concurso no es para mujeres que ya somos mam√°s y que tenemos cuarenta y tantos. Hay que darles el espacio a las nuevas generaciones, las ni√±as de veinte y tantos, que son una generaci√≥n nueva, que est√°n en otra, que todav√≠a no tienen hijos".
"Nosotras tenemos cosas m√°s importantes", enfatiz√≥. Por √∫ltimo, recomend√≥ a Palacios retomar la animaci√≥n, lo hace espectacular. Yo creo que ya pas√≥, hay que colgar el colaless, hay que colgarlo".
Leer m√°s de
